00149 int nfs_Getattr( nfs_arg_t         * parg,    
00150                  exportlist_t      * pexport, 
00151                  fsal_op_context_t       * pcontext,   
00152                  cache_inode_client_t    * pclient,
00153                  hash_table_t      * ht,
00154                  struct svc_req    * preq,    
00155                  nfs_res_t         * pres ) 
00156 {
00157         static char     funcName[] = "nfs_Getattr";
00158 
00159   fsal_attrib_list_t      attr;
00160         cache_entry_t         * pentry = NULL ;
00161   cache_inode_status_t    cache_status ;
00162   int                     rc = 0 ;
00163 
00164   if( ( pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00165                                      &(parg->arg_getattr2),
00166                                      &(parg->arg_getattr3.object),
00167                                      NULL, 
00168                                      &(pres->res_attr2.status),
00169                                      &(pres->res_getattr3.status),
00170                                      NULL,
00171                                      &attr, 
00172                                      pcontext, 
00173                                      pclient, 
00174                                      ht, 
00175                                      &rc ) ) == NULL )
00176     {
00177       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00178       return rc ;
00179    }
00180 
00181         /*
00182          * Get attributes.  Use NULL for the file name since we have the
00183          * vnode to define the file. 
00184          */
00185 
00186         if( cache_inode_getattr( pentry,
00187                            &attr, 
00188                            ht, 
00189                            pclient, 
00190                            pcontext, 
00191                            &cache_status ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00192     {
00193       /*
00194        * Client API should be keeping us from crossing junctions,
00195        * but double check to be sure. 
00196        */
00197       
00198       switch( preq->rq_vers )
00199         {
00200           
00201         case NFS_V2:
00202           /* Copy data from vattr to Attributes */
00203           if( nfs2_FSALattr_To_Fattr( pexport, &attr,
00204                                       &(pres->res_attr2.ATTR2res_u.attributes ) ) == 0 )
00205             {
00206               nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00207                                    preq->rq_vers, 
00208                                    CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT,
00209                                    &pres->res_attr2.status,
00210                                    &pres->res_getattr3.status,
00211                                    NULL, NULL,
00212                                    NULL, NULL, NULL,
00213                                    NULL, NULL, NULL);
00214               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00215             }
00216           pres->res_attr2.status = NFS_OK;
00217           break;
00218                         
00219         case NFS_V3:
00220           if( nfs3_FSALattr_To_Fattr( pexport, &attr, 
00221                                       &(pres->res_getattr3.GETATTR3res_u.resok.obj_attributes) ) == 0 )
00222             {
00223               nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00224                                    preq->rq_vers,
00225                                    CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT,
00226                                    &pres->res_attr2.status,
00227                                    &pres->res_getattr3.status,
00228                                    NULL, NULL,
00229                                    NULL, NULL, NULL,
00230                                    NULL, NULL, NULL);
00231               
00232               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00233             }
00234           pres->res_getattr3.status = NFS3_OK;
00235           break;
00236         } /* switch */
00237         
00238       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00239                 }
00240   
00241   
00242   nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00243                        preq->rq_vers, 
00244                        CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT,
00245                        &pres->res_attr2.status,
00246                        &pres->res_getattr3.status,
00247                        NULL, NULL,
00248                        NULL, NULL, NULL,
00249                        NULL, NULL, NULL);
00250   
00251         return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00252 } /* nfs_Getattr */
00253 
00262 void nfs_Getattr_Free( nfs_res_t * resp )
00263 {
00264   /* Nothing to do here */
00265   return ;
00266 } /* nfs_Getattr_Free */
